Text:
even this one sucks.
and my local cinema has better quality than this.
i am sorry but this sucks.
oh and there is no audio part 2,3,4.

this is yet another one where someone either A: upped the filesize to make you think its a dvd rip, or B: didnt know how to encode film, in which case, the kiddies need to leave this to the people who didnt get a computer as a xmas present or from their rich daddy.
thnx 4 your effort, but i waited for the BR version ;)
